modName: Massive Cloud Storage Network - Elysium Estates Patch
summary: Adds MCSN support to Elysium Estates player home. Giving access to over 140 containers in 4 categories all over the world.
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KTx4HBI.jpg[/IMG][/center]
[heading]Required Mods[/heading]
Morgaloth's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54285/?]Massive Cloud Storage Network[/url] v2.02 Complete
thejadeshadow's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33939/?]Elysium Estate[/url]
Make sure patch loads after Massive Cloud Storage Network AND Elysium Estate.

I'm sorry, but Home Patches are no longer Compatible with anything but MCSN Complete V2.02+

[heading]Description[/heading]
This house was so well laid out with custom containers i did not want to disturb the artistic beauty of it with my own containers. So with thejadshadow's permission, I co-opted several of his containers, and redirected them to my MCSN containers.

[heading]Installation[/heading]
Before installing this patch, please remove any items you have in the FOOD storage (Kitchen), SOUL GEM storage (Basement), INGREDIENTS storage (Basement), and SMITHING Storage (Basement). After Installing and Activating the MCSN Patch, these containers will be connected to your Cloud Storage.

[heading]Other Mods by Me:[/heading]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54285/?]Massive Cloud Storage Network[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54848/?]Massive Cloud Storage Network - Functional Homes Support[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54896/?]Massive Cloud Storage Network- Whiterun Mansion Support[/url]
author: Morgaloth
